Package io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.palette

package io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.inventorymenus.palette
Classes related to the palette of buttons found within inventory menus.
  • Class
    Description
    BaseInventoryPalette
    Abstract representing the generalisation of a palette of BaseInventoryButtons that allow for easy creation of a custom inventory.
    InventoryPalette
    Interface representing the functionality of any palette of buttons for a custom inventory.
